question: Which nation houses "Cano Cristales River"?
explanation: Cano Cristales is a river located in Colombia. Its source is Serrania de la Macarena and its mouth is Guayabero River. Due to the striking colours, caused by the presence of Macarenia Clavigera plants on the river bed, this river is also known as the "River of Five Colours" or the "Liquid Rainbow".
